title: Banned without any warning. (Im new to League of Legends, a bit more than 1 month playing.)
body:
So im new here in LoL (like 1 month or so) and i really like playing. Now i know i might been toxic but you guys didn't gave me a warning before banning me or didn't even muted me or something, just straight ban.

I want to sorry for my actions if you guys give me another chance, and ill take this as the warning that u guys never gave me.{{champion:32}}

replies.body: If you're toxic, it doesn't matter how long you've played. You can make a new account, but if you were toxic you brought this on yourself.

did you agree to the TOS when you created the account? agree again and again after every patch update? 

if you took 5 mins to read something that is your warning... 

you should know how to act towards others with out being told so... we all know its not ok to speed or to physically assault people we dont need to be told to not to do that...
If you've been playing for a month only, just make a new account and stop being toxic.

I would suggest making a support ticket and seeing if it can be downgraded to a 14 day ban if that was your first punishment, as I have seen that happen in the past.

You don't have anything to lose after all. If they do not lower your punishment then you can always make a new account and start over.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Thanks
Well, did you get chat logs with your ban?
Yeah, i got chat logs of 3 games :c Honestly not proud of em at all.
Post them on here if you want critique of them.

if you are permanently suspended, there may be a catch to it.

If I may ask, what year were you banned till? You'll see it when you attempt to log into the game.
banned within a month of playing...that's gotta be a record
Damn man. you just started. heres a pro tip. dont type unless its helpful to the team
You've got to be a little more specific. Did you get a notification as to why you count was banned?

Post your chat logs,

The only way that you will get perm banned on the first offense is if it is very bad, like racial slurs and such.
not sure raciall slurs are enough, that's usually only 15 day ban, must have death threads and other hate speach
Idk, I have seen multiple threads like this, and if you look at the chat logs, theres racial slurs and mild language.
Did you received chat restrictions or 14 days suspension before?
I never got a warning of any kind, not a mute not a 14 days ban, straight permaban.
My advice is, post the chatlogs if you want anyone to even care about this.

https://media2.giphy.com/media/iGSEDmbqxxlle/200.gif#4

Why u always lyin?
Was this a permanent ban or a 14 day ban?
